metadata.title: CVE-2022-48638 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: cgroup:cgroup_get_from_id() must check the looked-up kn is a directory cgroup hasto be one kernfs dir, otherwise kernel panic is caused, especially cgroupid is provide from userspace.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
